name: sales_summary_mv
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders, SUM("total") as revenue FROM "sales"
description: Materialized view of sales summary with order count and total revenue

name: high_value_orders_mv
sql: SELECT order_id, customer_id, total FROM "sales" WHERE "total" > 500
description: Materialized view of high-value orders over $500

name: monthly_sales_mv
sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', "order_date") as month, COUNT(*) as orders, SUM("total") as revenue FROM "sales" GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('month', "order_date")
description: Materialized view of monthly sales aggregation
